Conway.Cadron Settlement Park: Cadron Settlement Park is a 150-acre (61 ha) public park located in Conway, Arkansas. The park is operated by the city of Conway under a lease from the United States Army Corps of Engineers. It was established on October 14, 1979, and features a reconstructed blockhouse, a boat launching ramp, hiking trails, restrooms, picnic areas, pavilion, handicapped trails and parking areas, and interpretive signs.
